scheme_name: Yuvak Mangal Dal and Mahila Mangal Dal Self-Reliance Scheme
nodal_department: Department of Youth Welfare and Provincial Protection Corps
brief_description: Under this scheme, each group is provided financial assistance of ₹14,268/- for the purchase of essential materials for community use, with the aim of making them self-reliant.
detailed_description: The scheme &quot;Yuvak Mangal Dal and Mahila Mangal Dal Self-Reliance Scheme&quot; was launched by the Department of Youth Welfare and Provincial Protection Corps, Government of Uttarakhand. The scheme aims to promote self-reliance among village-level male and female youth groups (Mangal Dal) by financially supporting their capacity-building efforts. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to each group for the purchase of essential materials for community, with the objective of making them self-reliant.
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹14,268/- is provided to each group as a one-time grant. The amount is intended for purchasing essential items for community use, supporting the self-reliance of the group.
Note: The amount is transferred directly to the bank account of the group.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a recognized Yuvak Mangal Dal or Mahila Mangal Dal of Uttarakhand. The applicant group should be formally affiliated with the Department of Youth Welfare and PRD, Government of Uttarakhand.

steps: Step 1: The group should be affiliated with the Department of Youth Welfare & PRD. Step 2: A proposal should be approved in the Gram Panchayat's general assembly. Step 3: The group must submit the proposal to the PRD office along with all necessary documents (Details of all members of the group).
Step 1: The proposal is reviewed by a committee headed by the Chief Development Officer (CDO).
Step 2: Upon approval, the District Youth Welfare Officer is instructed to release the payment.
Step 3: The amount is transferred directly to the group's bank account.

documents_required: Proposal Approved by the Gram Panchayat's General Assembly Aadhaar Card of All Group Members Permanent Residence Certificates of All Group Members Bank Account Details of the Group
